processSignRequest

public void processSignRequest()
                        throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Method in support of COSIGN_SIGNDOCUMENT service. This service begins the entire process of digital signing with A.R.X. CoSign.

Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException

processSignedDocument

public void processSignedDocument()
                           throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Method in support of COSIGN_CHECKIN_SIGNEDDOCUMENT service. This service handles the response from A.R.X. CoSign to check-in the signed document, store the response data, and then pass the off to where ever they were heading.

Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException

processReviewRequest

public void processReviewRequest()
                          throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Method in support of COSIGN_VERIFYSIGNATURES service. Used to retrieve responses stored on a document or in database about signature fields.

intradoc.common.ServiceException
